It's finally here!

Thursday

Gerding Theater at the Armory

128 NW Eleventh Avenue Portland, Oregon 97209 | 503-445-3700

Registration begins at 8:30 am and we'll have some pastries and coffee to hold as you get to know some of your fellow attendees.

Food and Drinks
We will have coffee, water, and snacks available throughout the day. We don't provide lunch, but we have a 90 minute break in the day to allow time to go out to eat together.

Speakers
We have an awesome lineup of speakers that will be touching on a wide range of front-end design and dev topics. There's a good mix of design thought and tech throughout the day. See the lineup on frontendconf.com.

Meetups on August 23
The conversations that happen outside of the presentations are often my favorite part of conferences. We're lining up meetups throughout Portland so that you can spend more time talking shop and exploring the city.

Join us!
The conf is $199 if you're ready to register or check out frontendconf.com for the speaker list and a few more details.
If you'd like to share, we'd really appreciate it. I'm also giving away a little gift for shares this week: Details
Thank you,
Dan Denney
